headline.main: Survey Shows Use of Drugs By Students Fell Last Year

byline.original: By RICHARD L. BERKE, Special to The New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The number of high school seniors who say they have used illicit drugs at least once continued a downward trend last year, although there was no decline in reported use of the highly addictive crack, according to a national survey released today.
